com.hazelcast.internal.cluster.impl

Class ClusterJoinManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.hazelcast.internal.cluster.impl.ClusterJoinManager

  • public class ClusterJoinManager
extends Object
    ClusterJoinManager manages member join process.

    If this node is not master, then it will answer with sending master node's address to a join request.

    If this is master node, it will handle join request and notify all other members about newly joined member.

    • Method Detail

      • handleJoinRequest

        public void handleJoinRequest(JoinRequest joinRequest,
                              Connection connection)
        Handle a JoinRequestOp. If this node is not master, reply with a MasterResponseOp to let the joining node know the current master. Otherwise, if no other join is in progress, execute the JoinRequest
        Parameters:
        joinRequest - the join request
        connection - the connection to the joining node
        See Also:
        JoinRequestOp

      • validateJoinMessage

        public boolean validateJoinMessage(JoinMessage joinMessage)
                            throws Exception
        Validate that the configuration received from the remote node in joinMessage is compatible with the configuration of this node.
        Parameters:
        joinMessage - the JoinMessage received from another node.
        Returns:
        true if packet version of join message matches this node's packet version and configurations are found to be compatible, otherwise false.
        Throws:
        Exception - in case any exception occurred while checking compatibilty
        See Also:
        ConfigCheck

      • sendJoinRequest

        public boolean sendJoinRequest(Address toAddress,
                               boolean withCredentials)
        Send join request to toAddress.
        Parameters:
        toAddress - the currently known master address.
        withCredentials - use cluster credentials
        Returns:
        true if join request was sent successfully, otherwise false.

      • setThisMemberAsMaster

        public boolean setThisMemberAsMaster()

      • handleMasterResponse

        public void handleMasterResponse(Address masterAddress,
                                 Address callerAddress)
        Set master address, if required.
        Parameters:
        masterAddress - address of cluster's master, as provided in MasterResponseOp
        callerAddress - address of node that sent the MasterResponseOp
        See Also:
        MasterResponseOp

      • sendMasterQuestion

        public boolean sendMasterQuestion(Address toAddress)
        Send a WhoisMasterOp to designated address.
        Parameters:
        toAddress - the address to which the operation will be sent.
        Returns:
        true if the operation was sent, otherwise false.
